00038 struct pluginDeleter {
00039     void *m_dlHandle;
00040     std::string m_pluginName;
00041     pluginDeleter( void *dlHandle, std::string pluginName ): m_dlHandle( dlHandle ), m_pluginName( pluginName ) {}
00042     void operator()( image_io::FileFormat *format ) {
00043         delete format;
00044 #ifdef WIN32
00045 
00046         if( !FreeLibrary( ( HINSTANCE )m_dlHandle ) )
00047 #else
00048         if ( dlclose( m_dlHandle ) != 0 )
00049 #endif
00050             std::cerr << "Failed to release plugin " << m_pluginName << " (was loaded at " << m_dlHandle << ")";
00051 
00052         //we cannot use LOG here, because the loggers are gone allready
00053     }
00054 };
00055 struct dialect_missing {
00056     std::string dialect;
00057     std::string filename;
00058     bool operator()( IOFactory::FileFormatList::reference ref )const {
00059         const std::string dia = ref->dialects( filename );
00060         std::list<std::string> splitted = util::stringToList<std::string>( dia, ' ' );
00061         const bool ret = ( std::find( splitted.begin(), splitted.end(), dialect ) == splitted.end() );
00062         LOG_IF( ret, Runtime, warning ) << ref->getName() << " does not support the requested dialect " << util::MSubject( dialect );
00063         return ret;
00064     }
00065 };
00066 
00067 bool invalid_and_tell( Chunk &candidate )
00068 {
00069     LOG_IF( !candidate.isValid(), Runtime, error ) << "Ignoring invalid chunk. Missing properties: " << candidate.getMissing();
00070     return !candidate.isValid();
00071 }

00075 IOFactory::IOFactory()
00076 {
00077     const char *env_path = getenv( "ISIS_PLUGIN_PATH" );
00078     const char *env_home = getenv( "HOME" );
00079 
00080     if( env_path ) {
00081         findPlugins( boost::filesystem::path( env_path ).directory_string() );
00082     }
00083 
00084     if( env_home ) {
00085         const boost::filesystem::path home = boost::filesystem::path( env_home ) / "isis" / "plugins";
00086 
00087         if( boost::filesystem::exists( home ) ) {
00088             findPlugins( home.directory_string() );
00089         } else {
00090             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << home.directory_string() << " does not exist. Won't check for plugins there";
00091         }
00092     }
00093 
00094     findPlugins( std::string( PLUGIN_PATH ) );
00095 }

00097 bool IOFactory::registerFileFormat( const FileFormatPtr plugin )
00098 {
00099     if ( !plugin )return false;
00100 
00101     io_formats.push_back( plugin );
00102     std::list<util::istring> suffixes = plugin->getSuffixes(  );
00103     LOG( Runtime, info )
00104             << "Registering " << ( plugin->tainted() ? "tainted " : "" ) << "io-plugin "
00105             << util::MSubject( plugin->getName() )
00106             << " with supported suffixes " << suffixes;
00107     BOOST_FOREACH( util::istring & it, suffixes ) {
00108         io_suffix[it].push_back( plugin );
00109     }
00110     return true;
00111 }
00112 
00113 unsigned int IOFactory::findPlugins( const std::string &path )
00114 {
00115     boost::filesystem::path p( path );
00116 
00117     if ( !exists( p ) ) {
00118         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << util::MSubject( p.native_file_string() ) << " not found";
00119         return 0;
00120     }
00121 
00122     if ( !boost::filesystem::is_directory( p ) ) {
00123         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << util::MSubject( p.native_file_string() ) << " is no directory";
00124         return 0;
00125     }
00126 
00127     LOG( Runtime, info )   << "Scanning " << util::MSubject( p ) << " for plugins";
00128     boost::regex pluginFilter( std::string( "^" ) + DL_PREFIX + "isisImageFormat_" + "[[:word:]]+" + DL_SUFFIX + "$" );
00129     unsigned int ret = 0;
00130 
00131     for ( boost::filesystem::directory_iterator itr( p ); itr != boost::filesystem::directory_iterator(); ++itr ) {
00132         if ( boost::filesystem::is_directory( *itr ) )continue;
00133 
00134         if ( boost::regex_match( itr->path().leaf(), pluginFilter ) ) {
00135             const std::string pluginName = itr->path().file_string();
00136 #ifdef WIN32
00137             HINSTANCE handle = LoadLibrary( pluginName.c_str() );
00138 #else
00139             void *handle = dlopen( pluginName.c_str(), RTLD_NOW );
00140 #endif
00141 
00142             if ( handle ) {
00143 #ifdef WIN32
00144                 image_io::FileFormat* ( *factory_func )() = ( image_io::FileFormat * ( * )() )GetProcAddress( handle, "factory" );
00145 #else
00146                 image_io::FileFormat* ( *factory_func )() = ( image_io::FileFormat * ( * )() )dlsym( handle, "factory" );
00147 #endif
00148 
00149                 if ( factory_func ) {
00150                     FileFormatPtr io_class( factory_func(), _internal::pluginDeleter( handle, pluginName ) );
00151 
00152                     if ( registerFileFormat( io_class ) ) {
00153                         io_class->plugin_file = pluginName;
00154                         ret++;
00155                     } else {
00156                         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "failed to register plugin " << util::MSubject( pluginName );
00157                     }
00158                 } else {
00159 #ifdef WIN32
00160                     LOG( Runtime, warning )
00161                             << "could not get format factory function from " << util::MSubject( pluginName );
00162                     FreeLibrary( handle );
00163 #else
00164                     LOG( Runtime, warning )
00165                             << "could not get format factory function from " << util::MSubject( pluginName ) << ":" << util::MSubject( dlerror() );
00166                     dlclose( handle );
00167 #endif
00168                 }
00169             } else
00170 #ifdef WIN32
00171                 LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Could not load library " << util::MSubject( pluginName );
00172 
00173 #else
00174                 LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Could not load library " << util::MSubject( pluginName ) << ":" <<  util::MSubject( dlerror() );
00175 #endif
00176         } else {
00177             LOG( Runtime, verbose_info )
00178                     << "Ignoring " << util::MSubject( itr->path() )
00179                     << " because it doesn't match " << pluginFilter.str();
00180         }
00181     }
00182 
00183     return ret;
00184 }

00186 IOFactory &IOFactory::get()
00187 {
00188     return util::Singletons::get<IOFactory, INT_MAX>();
00189 }

00191 size_t IOFactory::loadFile( std::list<Chunk> &ret, const boost::filesystem::path &filename, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00192 {
00193     FileFormatList formatReader;
00194     formatReader = getFileFormatList( filename.file_string(), suffix_override, dialect );
00195     const size_t nimgs_old = ret.size();   // save number of chunks
00196     const std::string with_dialect = dialect.empty() ?
00197                                      std::string( "" ) : std::string( " with dialect \"" ) + dialect + "\"";
00198 
00199     if ( formatReader.empty() ) {
00200         if( !boost::filesystem::exists( filename ) ) {
00201             LOG( Runtime, error ) << util::MSubject( filename )
00202                                   << " does not exist as file, and no suitable plugin was found to generate data from "
00203                                   << ( suffix_override.empty() ? std::string( "that name" ) : std::string( "the suffix \"" ) + suffix_override + "\"" );
00204         } else if( suffix_override.empty() ) {
00205             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "No plugin found to read " << filename.file_string() << with_dialect;
00206         } else {
00207             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "No plugin supporting the requested suffix " << suffix_override << with_dialect << " was found";
00208         }
00209     } else {
00210         BOOST_FOREACH( FileFormatList::const_reference it, formatReader ) {
00211             LOG( ImageIoDebug, info )
00212                     << "plugin to load file" << with_dialect << " " << util::MSubject( filename ) << ": " << it->getName();
00213 
00214             try {
00215                 return it->load( ret, filename.file_string(), dialect );
00216             } catch ( std::runtime_error &e ) {
00217                 if( suffix_override.empty() ) {
00218                     LOG( Runtime, formatReader.size() > 1 ? warning : error )
00219                             << "Failed to load " <<  filename << " using " <<  it->getName() << with_dialect << " ( " << e.what() << " )";
00220                 } else {
00221                     LOG( Runtime, warning )
00222                             << "The enforced format " << it->getName()  << " failed to read " << filename << with_dialect
00223                             << " ( " << e.what() << " ), maybe it just wasn't the right format";
00224                 }
00225             }
00226         }
00227         LOG_IF( boost::filesystem::exists( filename ) && formatReader.size() > 1, Runtime, error ) << "No plugin was able to load: "   << util::MSubject( filename ) << with_dialect;
00228     }
00229 
00230     return ret.size() - nimgs_old;//no plugin of proposed list could load file
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 IOFactory::FileFormatList IOFactory::getFileFormatList( std::string filename, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00235 {
00236     std::list<std::string> ext;
00237     FileFormatList ret;
00238     _internal::dialect_missing remove_op;
00239 
00240     if( suffix_override.empty() ) { // detect suffixes from the filename
00241         const boost::filesystem::path fname( filename );
00242         ext = util::stringToList<std::string>( fname.leaf(), '.' ); // get all suffixes
00243 
00244         if( !ext.empty() )ext.pop_front(); // remove the first "suffix" - actually the basename
00245     } else ext = util::stringToList<std::string>( suffix_override, '.' );
00246 
00247     while( !ext.empty() ) {
00248         const util::istring wholeName( util::listToString( ext.begin(), ext.end(), ".", "", "" ).c_str() ); // (re)construct the rest of the suffix
00249         const std::map<util::istring, FileFormatList>::iterator found = get().io_suffix.find( wholeName );
00250 
00251         if( found != get().io_suffix.end() ) {
00252             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << found->second.size() << " plugins support suffix " << wholeName;
00253             ret.insert( ret.end(), found->second.begin(), found->second.end() );
00254         }
00255 
00256         ext.pop_front();
00257     }
00258 
00259     if( dialect.empty() ) {
00260         LOG( Debug, info ) << "No dialect given. Will use all " << ret.size() << " plugins";
00261     } else {//remove everything which lacks the dialect if there was some given
00262         remove_op.dialect = dialect;
00263         remove_op.filename = filename;
00264         ret.remove_if( remove_op );
00265         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Removed everything which does not support the dialect " << util::MSubject( dialect ) << " on " << filename << "(" << ret.size() << " plugins left)";
00266     }
00267 
00268     return ret;
00269 }
00270 
00271 std::list< Image > IOFactory::chunkListToImageList( std::list<Chunk> &src )
00272 {
00273     // throw away invalid chunks
00274     size_t errcnt = src.size();
00275     src.remove_if( _internal::invalid_and_tell );
00276     errcnt -= src.size();
00277 
00278     std::list< Image > ret;
00279 
00280     while ( !src.empty() ) {
00281         LOG( Debug, info ) << src.size() << " Chunks left to be distributed.";
00282         size_t before = src.size();
00283 
00284         Image buff( src );
00285 
00286         if ( buff.isClean() && buff.isValid() ) { //if the image was successfully indexed and is valid, keep it
00287             ret.push_back( buff );
00288             LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Image " << ret.size() << " with size " << buff.getSizeAsString() <<  " and value range " << buff.getMinMax() << " done.";
00289         } else {
00290             LOG_IF( !buff.getMissing().empty(), Runtime, error )
00291                     << "Cannot insert image. Missing properties: " << buff.getMissing();
00292             errcnt += before - src.size();
00293         }
00294     }
00295 
00296     LOG_IF( errcnt, Runtime, warning ) << "Dropped " << errcnt << " chunks because they didn't form valid images";
00297     return ret;
00298 }
00299 
00300 size_t IOFactory::load( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &path, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00301 {
00302     const boost::filesystem::path p( path );
00303     const size_t loaded = boost::filesystem::is_directory( p ) ?
00304                           get().loadPath( chunks, p, suffix_override, dialect ) :
00305                           get().loadFile( chunks, p, suffix_override, dialect );
00306     BOOST_FOREACH( Chunk & ref, chunks ) {
00307         if ( ! ref.hasProperty( "source" ) )
00308             ref.setPropertyAs( "source", p.file_string() );
00309     }
00310     return loaded;
00311 }
00312 
00313 std::list<data::Image> IOFactory::load( const std::string &path, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00314 {
00315     std::list<Chunk> chunks;
00316     const boost::filesystem::path p( path );
00317     const size_t loaded = load( chunks, path, suffix_override, dialect );
00318     const std::list<data::Image> images = chunkListToImageList( chunks );
00319     LOG( Runtime, info )
00320             << "Generated " << images.size() << " images out of " << loaded << " chunks loaded from " << ( boost::filesystem::is_directory( p ) ? "directory " : "" ) << p;
00321     return images;
00322 }
00323 
00324 size_t IOFactory::loadPath( std::list<Chunk> &ret, const boost::filesystem::path &path, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00325 {
00326     int loaded = 0;
00327 
00328     if( m_feedback ) {
00329         const size_t length = std::distance( boost::filesystem::directory_iterator( path ), boost::filesystem::directory_iterator() ); //@todo this will also count directories
00330         m_feedback->show( length, std::string( "Reading " ) + util::Value<std::string>( length ).toString( false ) + " files from " + path.file_string() );
00331     }
00332 
00333     for ( boost::filesystem::directory_iterator i( path ); i != boost::filesystem::directory_iterator(); ++i )  {
00334         if ( boost::filesystem::is_directory( *i ) )continue;
00335 
00336         loaded += loadFile( ret, *i, suffix_override, dialect );
00337 
00338         if( m_feedback )
00339             m_feedback->progress();
00340     }
00341 
00342     if( m_feedback )
00343         m_feedback->close();
00344 
00345     return loaded;
00346 }

00348 bool IOFactory::write( const data::Image &image, const std::string &path, std::string suffix_override, const std::string &dialect )
00349 {
00350     return write( std::list<data::Image>( 1, image ), path, suffix_override, dialect );

00354 bool IOFactory::write( std::list<data::Image> images, const std::string &path, std::string suffix_override, const std::string &dialect )
00355 {
00356     const FileFormatList formatWriter = get().getFileFormatList( path, suffix_override, dialect );
00357 
00358     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::reference ref, images ) {
00359         ref.checkMakeClean();
00360     }
00361 
00362     if( formatWriter.size() ) {
00363         BOOST_FOREACH( FileFormatList::const_reference it, formatWriter ) {
00364             LOG( Debug, info )
00365                     << "plugin to write to " <<  path << ": " << it->getName()
00366                     <<  ( dialect.empty() ?
00367                           std::string( "" ) :
00368                           std::string( " using dialect: " ) + dialect
00369                         );
00370 
00371             try {
00372                 it->write( images, path, dialect );
00373                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << images.size()
00374                                      << " images written to " << path << " using " <<  it->getName()
00375                                      <<  ( dialect.empty() ?
00376                                            std::string( "" ) :
00377                                            std::string( " and dialect: " ) + dialect
00378                                          );
00379                 return true;
00380             } catch ( std::runtime_error &e ) {
00381                 LOG( Runtime, warning )
00382                         << "Failed to write " <<  images.size()
00383                         << " images to " << path << " using " <<  it->getName() << " (" << e.what() << ")";
00384             }
00385         }
00386     } else {
00387         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "No plugin found to write to: " << path; //@todo error message missing
00388     }
00389 
00390     return false;
00391 }
00392 void IOFactory::setProgressFeedback( boost::shared_ptr<util::ProgressFeedback> feedback )
00393 {
00394     IOFactory &This = get();
00395 
00396     if( This.m_feedback )This.m_feedback->close();
00397 
00398     This.m_feedback = feedback;
00399 }
